summary: High-Res retexture of the Steel Sword
descriptionHtml:
[b]By PonyKiller[/b]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I initially made this for myself. 
I felt the original steel sword was dull and just plain boring.
So, I made this.
It is high-res and contains a bluish blade with dark details. 
The grip is re-textured so it now looks like black leather.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Details[/b]
- Dried blood on the blade
- Blue,Black and whit blade
- Leather grip

- And everything is High-Res!!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you enjoyed this texture mod please endorse it :D 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Change log[/b]
1.0: Initial release.
1.5: Reuploaded file due to problems with the original.
author: PonyKiller
